Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: If you want to start your day right in Amsterdam, you need to check Bagels & Beans: they offer an amazing and rich menus where you choose your breakfast according to your taste: the food is tasty and with many types of bagels to select from. Plus the place offer a unique scent of peace and calm.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text:
Really nice coffee shop, that specialises in bagels.
And it really focuses on all kind of bagels. Probably, the best choice of creative bagel breakfast combos you can find in Amsterdam. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Great place to have breakfast and your morning coffee. The service is friendly and quick, joint atmosphere is calm and quite. There is a dog who seems to live here or nearby and comes to visit this place in the morning. I uploaded several ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: This was the first place we visited when we just arrived in Amsterdam in the morning and most of the other places were still closed. ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: It‚Äôd be much healthier if people working there wears gloves. They work with bare hands and touch their face then the pin machine and then to the lid of the coffee cup or to the bagels. Seen it today, not going there again.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Got the hagelslag for 3.50 euros.  It was tasty!  Friendly atmosphere and a great place to enjoy a coffee.  Place is also dog friendly. Would definitely recommend!

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text:
Everything bagels! Place is brilliant with a lot to select from as you would think they have a limited menu, but not. Sweet, savoury, any types of bagel with sauce, cream, jams, cheese, ham, etc to top it with.
Great way to start a day.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: What a wonderful surprise! We went here for breakfast based on Google reviews and it was totally worth it! Very friendly staff and dog friendly place. Breakfast Bagel is great! Worth a visit if you're in the area.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Pretty slow, not clean, in the sense, I will never forget one woman at the bar, preparing a smoothie ( not mine ) and sneezing in the air at the same time, without mask, during a pandemic. You can't judge by one episode. But still.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Well the bagels are nice but the coffee was really small for the price. Had to order two coffees. Good place for working remotely.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Super delicious breakfast and brunch restaurant in the west part of Amsterdam. We had the lazy breakfast + omelette. The portion comes in small size, but was quite enough for my hunger. Stuff was nice and atmosphere nicely chilled. Lots of ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: 10/10 breakfast, service and ambiance. Would recommend.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: While there's a good range of bagel choices across the menu, this B&B's take away option is not ideal for those who may be in a rush. Nearly 15min to make one BLT bagel?! Clearly too much time was taken writing a message on the inside of ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: I had a very pleasant stay here, good and drinks are great, so is the service.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Very friendly service, great food with plenty of vegetarian/vegan options, great coffee and a good atmosphere to catch up with friends in or to get some work done.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Awesome bagels deal: 6 bagels for 5,70! You can ge them frozen too to last longer. Lovely staff and nice sitting down too for post-COVID. Much nice neighbourhood branch compared to the always super busy ones in the center, team is much nicer.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: We enjoyed the food and the place! Also my kid love it, there are so many toys! Nice choice for family!

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: The service is slow and the orders were mixed up and I am still not sure even after asking that I got the right order.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Great service. Good food and friendly staff

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Staff was not very friendly. Barista looked a bit nervous. Latte with caramel had nothing with coffee - pure caramel. Kudos for changing the coffee, but the way they did it was not same as in Starbucks

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text:
Food is always nice, however the staff has been very unprofessional.
We were helped last of 3 couples, while we where there first. Did not even get drinks first while the girls served food for the couple who came after us, then ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Absolutely delightful place very healthy fresh clean food was so happy to find this place and eat here

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: I like this location but bagels and beans are somehow consistently delicious üòã

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Kid friendly cafe,   nice space, friendly staff, tasty food~üíú

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Nice place for (late) breakfast in the weekends, friendly staff and enough space

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Service was very slow, coffee wasn't very good. Expensive for what you get

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Cozy coffee and bagels place, my default choice for a brunch around Bos en Lommer square

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text:
Awesome bagels, friendly staff and good pricing. Ate here few days in a row. Strongly recommend the avocado bagelüíú
One recommendation: It would be even more awesome if they start using non-plastic straws from sustainable and recyclable materials. üå±

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Staying in the local area came across this gem! The bagels and coffee were amazing! Love the choices, the staff were friendly and patient also the atmosphere was nice and relaxed! Perfect for a spot to eat in the morning to afternoon! Thanks

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Very friendly staff, delicious Oatly barrista cappuccino  and vegan raw pecan pie. Two patios offer comfortable, flowery, outside- inside spaces, without car fumes and traffic noise. The food is prepared with careful attention making it ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: I didn't know this restaurant chain. I was pleased to eat there during my trip to Amsterdam. They serve healthy food and have a lot of choice (gluten free, vegan and what not) Though it may be expensive (30e) for two for breakfast, it is worth it !

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Food was great, I love bagels and they always give a generous amount of cream cheese! When we came they didn‚Äôt have the sweet iced coffee which was disappointing. Service was quite slow, they need more staff during busy times.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text:
Very good bagel (smoked chicken on sourdough bread), and decent iced green tea.
Bit noisy establishment, especially with Snowy the dog voicing his/her opinion every now and then...

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: A nice place to get some hot drinks and bagel sandwiches, for a sit down or to go. It's a great place to work or study and they have free wifi for customers. This location also has a cute little dog named Snowy hanging around.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: I like the Bagels & Beans franchise, however this one in Bos en Lommer is by far the most dirty one I have been to. Sticky and not so clean tables and dirty floor. Staff seems not trained well, slow service. Staff smokes in front of the main entrance. However the staff is nice. Suggestion, try another Bagel & Beans restaurant.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Great food, great drinks. Super professional service. My friends and I were here three times during our short trip to Amsterdam

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Great for lazy mornings / afternoons. Tasty bagels, mostly organically sourced ingredients, including the excellent coffee. Friendly atmosphere. Free Wi-Fi so some non-officebound locals are always to be found working here. Outside seating on the inner courtyards is a nice bonus in summer. A great way to start the day.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: The staff was so incredibly helpful and the place is very kids friendly (they even have high chairs and toys). Affordable and good food and a varied menu. Not mind-blowing or anything but a really nice place.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: We stayed in the XO Blue Tower and found this place close by. The staff were friendly, inside was well presented and the breakfast bagels were spot on. Highly recommend this place, great way to start the day üëå

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Interesting experience buying bagels to go - after paying for my six bagels - I was left at the register without telling or asking me anything. Staff was doing whatever they were doing and not even looking at me.  Bagels were ready in the ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Friendly staff, menu - don't go there if you don't like hard bagels because there is little else to choose from. Typical Dutch cafe. Pet friendly

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Delicious bagels and good coffee.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Wow, amazing place for coffee and breakfast. A lots of bagels options! If you are in the area, you just must visit them. The staff is very polite and it is a dog friendly place.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: I love the food in this place, it taste the same in all of them. I usually go on weekends. And I always have the cheesecake.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Nice place and excellent food, with good quality  ingredients and a possible wide selection of them. If you are around Bos en Lommer you must try it.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Feels like at home, bit messy, kids , cats , dogs . Bagel is good - still can't compare to Holy Bagles in Modiin...

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Just amazing! Delicious bagels, friendly stuff and quite environment. Will be back for sure!

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: I had some very delicious bagels with hot chocolate. Very nice atmosphere and friendly waiters.

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: Relaxed atmosphere, accessible for English speakers, vegan and vegetarian options are clearly marked on every menu and most importantly DELICIOUS, FRESH, food and drinks. üëèüëèüëèüëè

the food was great as well, we were a little group of people, we all enjoyed our Food and drinks...

Name: Bagels & Beans Amsterdam, Bos en Lommerweg
Review Text: I enjoyed this place so much that I went there twice while I was in Amsterdam. The bagels are great, the staff very nice and the place super confortable!
